lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.question: What did the Holy Spirit choose Saul and Barnabas to do?
What happened when the evil magician Elymas opposed them?
What other name did Saul go by?
In the city of Antioch, what did the whole city come to hear?
Because the Jews in Antioch were jealous, what did they do?
answers: They threw Paul and Barnabas out

questions.question: In Iconium, what did the Jews plan to do to Paul and Barnabas?
What did the people of Lystra think after Paul healed a manâ€™s legs?
What happened after the Jews in Lystra stoned Paul?
answers: They dragged him outside the city, but he stood up and went back inside
He escaped before they caught him

questions.question: What did Paul and Barnabas do on their way home?
answers: Stopped in the cities they had visited to encourage the believers

questions.question: When they returned to Antioch, what did Paul and Barnabas do?
answers: They told the church all that God had done
They immediately left again for a second trip
They wrote a book of the Bible
